content.description: Mostly bolted face climb with a little small gear near the top.  Fun Crux move about mid route.
content.protection: 4-5 bolts, small stoppers and cams for the top 20 ft. Chain anchor.

content.description: Bouldery start to first bolt, then thin friction and edging to the second bolt.  Somewhat runout to the third bolt (take care if you're short clipping the third bolt, ie, under 6' tall).  Near the top, step left to the arete just right of the crack to the left.  Up to the anchor on the rim of the formation.
content.protection: Bolted sport route.  Somewhat runout between the second and third bolts.  Third bolt clip is reachy from the nice stance.  Take care if you're short (ie, under 6' tall).  Fixed anchor at top.
content.location: Located in the center of the wall, to the left of the deep, wide crack in the middle of the wall.  To the right of Sirens of Almo.

content.description: Clip the first bolt from boulder. Step off boulder onto slab (crux). The route eases up a lot after the first 10 feet.
content.protection: One bolt down low then small to medium nuts and cams. Chain anchor.
